description:
A quick fix for your storage needs. Equipped with the Boa attachment system securing the bag to your bike is quick, easy, and super secure. The innovative mount is compatible with fixed or dropper seat posts. And the roll-top design means that when you don’t need all 16L, just do a few extra rolls to adjust the size.

  • Rugged 140/500-denier fabric with a PU coating and welded seams keeps precipitation and road spray out
  • Roll-top design gives you adjustable volume and access from the back
  • Boa® Fit System allows secure attachment to seat posts, including droppers
  • Quick mounting system makes it easy to swap between bikes
  • Soft rubber padding at the contact points protects your bike
  • Bungee cargo net is a is there to stash a jacket, or other lightweight items
name: EVOC Seat Pack Boa WP
